name: Mobilization
description:
First person shooter. Light humor, dynamics and action will allow you to return to the atmosphere of first-person shooters of the 90s.
Intuitive first-person shooter in the classic tradition of the genre.
It is not necessary to know languages ​​​​and read a lot of text, just go and destroy everything around.
Throwing knives, grenades, bombs and a whole arsenal of small arms will help you have fun and achieve any goal.

A mercenary army financed by a group of hostile nations under the command of a fugitive general Jonathan Badon
captured the Allied military base on one of the islands in the Pacific Ocean.
Experiments with biological weapons are being carried out there, the purpose of which is the destruction of our country and allied states.
We have selected the best of the best to participate in the operation to regain control of the base.
We must recapture the base at any cost.
You and your group act immediately.
Your goal is to destroy the enemy manpower and regain control over the island.
Code name for Operation "Mobilization".
Good luck.
